::Striker::

Striker walks forward, coming up to Spears and putting his hand on her chin, 
raising her face.

"We can take alot more," he says to her, "For the years which the Maximals 
have been on this planet, we have possibly taken more defeats than any other 
group in history, and we're still going."

He points to the Ark. "That ship has taken more battles than anything on this 
planet, and its still standing. Barely, but standing."

He sighs. He remembered, when he had first landed on the planet, how the Ark 
was in good shape, repaired from its crash and fully functional.

"And we still stand too, having taken almost as much as the Ark. We can take 
alot more, if we don't doubt ourselves!"
